Name: Quince (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 9 Tagen zu einem Quittenbusch heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden. Bringt manchmal mehrere Quitten pro Ernte ein.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Вырастает через 9 дней и продолжает давать урожай после первого сбора.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the fall. Takes 9 days to mature into a quince bush. Continues to produce after the first harvest, with a chance to yield multiple fruits.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天种植。 需要9天才能长成一棵木梨小树。 在第一次收获后继续结果，有机会产出多个木梨。
